data.text:
The location of this hotel is in prime location.From here you can access easily bur juman metro walkable distance. It was found clean and safe. Receptionists and all attendants were polite and helpful.
Food wise, they are providing breakfast and have to improve  varieties further
data.title: Rose garden Hotel- Bur dubai

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Vinoth,
Greetings and thank you so much for choosing Rose Garden Hotel Apartments for your stay in Dubai.

We're delighted that you found our location convenient and accessible, It's fantastic to hear that you found our premises clean and safe, and our team polite and helpful—it's always our aim to make our guests feel comfortable and well taken care of.

We appreciate your feedback regarding the breakfast variety and take it seriously. We're constantly striving to enhance our offerings, and your input helps us immensely.  

Thank you again for your kind words and for sharing your experience. We hope to welcome you back soon to provide an even better stay!

Best Regards
owner_response.author: Jahir Hussain

data.text: Stayed for 7nights with my family, infant and 5yr kid, feel very comfortable like a home. Room is very clean and fully furnished. Room service is excellent, very polite and decent to guest. Price seems bit higher range
data.title: Very comfortable for family especially who has plan to travel with kids and infant

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Thilakaraja,

Warm Greetings from Rose Garden Hotel Apartments,

 Warm Greetings from Rose Garden Hotel Apartments Bur Dubai 

Thank you for taking out time to share valuable feedback on your stay at our property.

We are delighted to learn that you had a memorable stay with us.

It is so inspiring for us to see that our guests have had a beautiful stay, which is the biggest recognition for all the efforts we put in. We are glad to know that our team member has provided extraordinary service to you, We have shared your wonderful feedback with the whole team.

We appreciate your feedback regarding the pricing, and please be assured that we regularly review our rates to ensure they align with the quality and services we provide. Your insights guide us in our efforts to offer competitive pricing while maintaining our high standards.

The team looks forward to your return soon again, we hope is now your home whenever you’re in the city.
Best regards
owner_response.author: Jahir Hussain

data.text:
Every thing is fine and excellent.
2 Beds, 2 toilets, kitchen, 2 Tv, sofa, kitchenware, washing machine, and refrigerator available. The location is convenient to shops and Metro. You can have the concierge call for food delivery w/o charges.
data.title: NICE STAY, BUDGET FRIENDLY, FAST LIFT

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Warm Greetings from Rose Garden Hotel Apartments,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for sharing your wonderful feedback. 

We're thrilled to hear that you had a nice and budget-friendly stay with us.

It's fantastic to know that you found our facilities excellent, including the amenities provided in your accommodation. We're delighted that our location was convenient for your needs, with easy access to shops and the Metro.

We're glad you enjoyed the services such as the concierge's assistance . Your comfort and convenience are our top priorities, and we're thrilled that you had a pleasant experience.

We highly appreciate your comments on behalf of our all staff and management, and look forward to welcoming you once again at Rose Garden
owner_response.author: Jahir Hussain

data.text: We stayed serval times in this hotel and always happy to stay there.  Close to the Metro, shopping.  Lot of places to eat around this area.  Very helpful friendly staff.  They work hard to make all the guests happy and feel like home.  We have met same staff all the times, and nice to see they work with this hotel for a long time.  Clean and spacious rooms, enough pots and pans to cook meals.  Good hot water, A/C, enough TV channels.  We hope to stay again in the near future.
data.title: Very Good Family Hotel!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jayanth,
Greetings from Rose Garden Hotel Apartments!

Thank you for sharing your wonderful experience with us. We are delighted to hear that you have enjoyed multiple stays at our hotel and that our location, friendly staff, and amenities have consistently met your expectations. It's truly heartwarming to know that our efforts in making our guests feel at home are recognized.

We take pride in maintaining clean and spacious rooms equipped with all the essentials to ensure a comfortable stay. Your compliments about our team's dedication and their longevity with us mean a lot. Knowing that you felt well taken care of encourages us to continue delivering exceptional service.

We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to welcoming you back for another fantastic stay in the near future. If there's anything specific you'd like for your next visit, please don't hesitate to let us know.

Warm regards,
Jahir Hussain | Asst Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Jahir Hussain

data.text: Mr. Rafi and Mr. Calvin and rest of the staff were friendly, co-operative and helpful. The hotel is neat and clean, very near to metro. The lobby is perfect, breakfast is good. Car parking available, best for families and solo travellers. Keep it up
data.title: Hotel review

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Mr. Sharan,

Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review. We are thrilled to hear that you found our staff to be friendly, cooperative, and helpful. It's always great to know that our guests feel welcomed and taken care of.

We are also pleased to hear that you found our hotel to be neat and clean, and conveniently located near the metro. Our lobby is designed to provide a welcoming atmosphere, and we're glad that you found it perfect. We're also thrilled that you enjoyed our breakfast!

Thank you for mentioning our car parking availability, we understand how important it is for our guests to have a hassle-free parking experience. We are happy to hear that you would recommend our hotel to both families and solo travellers. We'll do our best to keep it up and continue to exceed your expectations. 

Thank you for choosing to stay with us, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon!

Best regards,
Jahir Hussain
owner_response.author: Jahir Hussain
